mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, title, genre, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(release_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') as release_date, poster_path, stars FROM movie left outer join (SELECT movie_no, ROUND(AVG(stars),1) as stars FROM stars GROUP BY movie_no) ms on movie.num=ms.movie_no ORDER BY stars desc nulls last) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 20

SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, title, genre, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(release_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') as release_date, poster_path, stars FROM movie left outer join (SELECT movie_no, ROUND(AVG(stars),1) as stars FROM stars GROUP BY movie_no) ms on movie.num=ms.movie_no ORDER BY dbms_random.value) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 20
SELECT * FROM movie left outer join (SELECT movie_no, ROUND(AVG(stars),1) as stars, count(stars) as count FROM stars GROUP BY movie_no) ms on movie.num=ms.movie_no WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STARS (movie_no, user_id, stars) VALUES(#{num},#{id},#{star})
INSERT INTO HEART (movie_no, user_id, heart) VALUES(#{num},#{id},#{heart})
